backend/main.mo: Motoko canister that configures baseline coin values and processes coin condition metrics to return grade estimation, value breakdown, and a status message.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing camera permission‑flow updates and the related frontend file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries for all frontend files covering components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind‑based style variables and theming for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML document bootstrapping the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component rendering the header, grading flow, and footer.
Header displaying the app logo, title, and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/Brand/HeroBackdr: Wrapper component adding a low‑opacity hero background image behind its children.
frontend/src/components/CoinCapture/Capt: Preview screen showing the captured image with retake and continue actions.
Alert listing best‑practice tips for photographing coins.
frontend/src/components/CoinCapture/Coin: Camera‑capture component with gesture‑based camera start, permission/error handling, capture controls, and upload fallback.
Main state machine coordinating capture method selection, preview, metadata entry, analysis, and results handling.
frontend/src/components/CoinCapture/Flow: Displays an error card when the analysis flow enters an invalid state and offers a restart button.
frontend/src/components/CoinCapture/Imag: Provides a UI card for selecting an image file and triggers callbacks for file selection or canceling.
frontend/src/components/Metadata/CoinMet: Renders a metadata entry form with validation, error handling, and submit/back controls for coin details.
frontend/src/components/Results/Analysis: Shows success, error, or fallback result views for coin analysis, including the image and metadata summary.
frontend/src/components/Results/Estimate: Displays a disclaimer explaining limitations of automated grade and value estimates.
frontend/src/components/Results/Submitte: Shows a compact summary of submitted coin metadata including optional mint mark and notes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCoinAnalysis.ts: Handles the coin analysis workflow, including preprocessing, feature extraction, backend calls, and error state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context using Internet Identity, managing login flow, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and a warm metallic color theme with light/dark mode variables.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and an Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/types/coin.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces for coin metadata and analysis result/valuation fields.
frontend/src/utils/coinImageHeuristics.t: Implements client‑side image feature extraction and heuristics for sharpness, contrast, and edge clarity.
frontend/src/utils/imagePreprocess.ts: Resizes and compresses images client‑side before analysis and returns a processed File.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme, colors, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores project state, feature requirements, issues, and architectural notes for the coin‑grading app.
